pccc.cpp

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 
00011 //#define TO_FILE
00012 
00013 #include "itpp/itcomm.h"
00014 #include "SISO.h"
00015 #include "Progress_Timer.h"
00016 
00017 using namespace itpp;
00018 using tr::SISO;
00019 using tr::threshold;
00020 using std::cout;
00021 using std::endl;
00022 using std::string;
00023 
00024 int main(void)
00025 {
00026     //general parameters
00027     //double threshold_value = 100;
00028     string map_metric="Viterbi";
00029     ivec gen = "013 015";//octal form, feedback first
00030     int constraint_length = 4;
00031     int nb_errors_lim = 3000;
00032     int nb_bits_lim = int(1e6);
00033     int perm_len = (1<<14);//total number of bits in a block (with tail)
00034     int nb_iter = 10;//number of iterations in the turbo decoder
00035     vec EbN0_dB = "0:0.1:5";
00036     double R = 1.0/3.0;//coding rate (non punctured PCCC)
00037     double Ec = 1.0;//coded bit energy
00038 
00039     //other parameters
00040     string filename = "Res/pccc_"+to_str(perm_len)+"_orig"+map_metric+".it";
00041     int nb_bits = perm_len-(constraint_length-1);//number of bits in a block (without tail)
00042     vec sigma2 = (0.5*Ec/R)*pow(inv_dB(EbN0_dB), -1.0);//N0/2
00043     double Lc;//scaling factor
00044     int nb_blocks;//number of blocks
00045     int nb_errors;
00046     ivec perm(perm_len);
00047     ivec inv_perm(perm_len);
00048     bvec bits(nb_bits);
00049     int cod_bits_len = perm_len*gen.length();
00050     bmat cod1_bits;//tail is added
00051     bvec tail;
00052     bvec cod2_input;
00053     bmat cod2_bits;
00054     int rec_len = int(1.0/R)*perm_len;
00055     bvec coded_bits(rec_len);
00056     vec rec(rec_len);
00057     vec dec1_intrinsic_coded(cod_bits_len);
00058     vec dec2_intrinsic_coded(cod_bits_len);
00059     vec apriori_data(perm_len);//a priori LLR for information bits
00060     vec extrinsic_coded(perm_len);
00061     vec extrinsic_data(perm_len);
00062     bvec rec_bits(perm_len);
00063     int snr_len = EbN0_dB.length();
00064     mat ber(nb_iter,snr_len);
00065     ber.zeros();
00066     register int en,n;
00067 
00068     //Recursive Systematic Convolutional Code
00069     Rec_Syst_Conv_Code cc;
00070     cc.set_generator_polynomials(gen, constraint_length);//initial state should be the zero state
00071 
00072     //BPSK modulator
00073     BPSK bpsk;
00074 
00075     //AWGN channel
00076     AWGN_Channel channel;
00077 
00078     //SISO modules
00079     SISO siso;
00080     siso.set_generators(gen, constraint_length);
00081     siso.set_map_metric(map_metric);
00082     siso.set_viterbi_win_len(5*constraint_length);//Viterbi & SOVA
00083     //siso.set_sova_scaling_factor(1);//SOVA only
00084     //siso.set_sova_threshold(INFINITY);
00085 
00086     //BER
00087     BERC berc;
00088 
00089     //Progress timer
00090     tr::Progress_Timer timer;
00091     timer.set_max(snr_len);
00092 
00093     //Randomize generators
00094     RNG_randomize();
00095 
00096     //main loop
00097     timer.progress(0.0);
00098     for (en=0;en<snr_len;en++)
00099     {
00100         channel.set_noise(sigma2(en));
00101         Lc = -2/sigma2(en);//normalisation factor for intrinsic information (take into account the BPSK mapping)
00102         nb_errors = 0;
00103         nb_blocks = 0;
00104         while ((nb_errors<nb_errors_lim) && (nb_blocks*nb_bits<nb_bits_lim))//if at the last iteration the nb. of errors is inferior to lim, then process another block
00105         {
00106             //permutation
00107             perm = sort_index(randu(perm_len));
00108             //inverse permutation
00109             inv_perm = sort_index(perm);
00110 
00111             //bits generation
00112             bits = randb(nb_bits);
00113 
00114             //parallel concatenated convolutional code
00115             cc.encode_tail(bits, tail, cod1_bits);//tail is added here to information bits to close the trellis
00116             cod2_input = concat(bits, tail);
00117             cc.encode(cod2_input(perm), cod2_bits);
00118             for (n=0;n<perm_len;n++)//output with no puncturing
00119             {
00120                 coded_bits(3*n) = cod2_input(n);//systematic output
00121                 coded_bits(3*n+1) = cod1_bits(n,0);//first parity output
00122                 coded_bits(3*n+2) = cod2_bits(n,0);//second parity output
00123             }
00124 
00125             //BPSK modulation (1->-1,0->+1) + AWGN channel
00126             rec = channel(bpsk.modulate_bits(coded_bits));
00127 
00128             //form input for SISO blocks
00129             for (n=0;n<perm_len;n++)
00130             {
00131                 dec1_intrinsic_coded(2*n) = Lc*rec(3*n);
00132                 dec1_intrinsic_coded(2*n+1) = Lc*rec(3*n+1);
00133                 dec2_intrinsic_coded(2*n) = 0.0;//systematic output of the CC is already used in decoder1
00134                 dec2_intrinsic_coded(2*n+1) = Lc*rec(3*n+2);
00135             }
00136             //turbo decoder
00137             apriori_data.zeros();//a priori LLR for information bits
00138             for (n=0;n<nb_iter;n++)
00139             {
00140                 //first decoder
00141                 //siso.rsc(extrinsic_coded, extrinsic_data, dec1_intrinsic_coded, apriori_data, true);
00142                 siso.rsc(extrinsic_coded, extrinsic_data, dec1_intrinsic_coded, apriori_data);
00143                 //interleave
00144                 apriori_data = extrinsic_data(perm);
00145                 //threshold
00146                 //apriori_data = threshold(apriori_data, threshold_value);
00147                 //second decoder
00148                 siso.rsc(extrinsic_coded, extrinsic_data, dec2_intrinsic_coded, apriori_data);
00149 
00150                 //decision
00151                 apriori_data += extrinsic_data;//a posteriori information
00152                 rec_bits = bpsk.demodulate_bits(-apriori_data(inv_perm));//take into account the BPSK mapping
00153                 //count errors
00154                 berc.clear();
00155                 berc.count(bits, rec_bits.left(nb_bits));
00156                 ber(n,en) += berc.get_errorrate();
00157 
00158                 //deinterleave for the next iteration
00159                 apriori_data = extrinsic_data(inv_perm);
00160             }//end iterations
00161             nb_errors += int(berc.get_errors());//get number of errors at the last iteration
00162             nb_blocks++;
00163         }//end blocks (while loop)
00164 
00165         //compute BER over all tx blocks
00166         ber.set_col(en, ber.get_col(en)/nb_blocks);
00167 
00168         //show progress
00169         timer.progress(1+en);
00170     }
00171     timer.toc_print();
00172 
00173 #ifdef TO_FILE
00174     //save results to file
00175     it_file ff(filename);
00176     ff << Name("BER") << ber;
00177     ff << Name("EbN0_dB") << EbN0_dB;
00178     ff << Name("gen") << gen;
00179     ff << Name("R") << R;
00180     ff << Name("nb_iter") << nb_iter;
00181     ff << Name("perm_len") << perm_len;
00182     ff << Name("nb_errors_lim") << nb_errors_lim;
00183     ff << Name("nb_bits_lim") << nb_bits_lim;
00184     ff.close();
00185 #else
00186     cout << EbN0_dB << endl;
00187     //show BER
00188     cout << ber << endl;
00189 #endif
00190 
00191     return 0;
00192 }
